Moving from console to PC has been such a pain but this game really helped me from start to finish. Learning the controls like the long jump was a pain but helped me in the end. This game was long and some chapters felt like hell for me, but they were all an experience that I ended up loving. The puzzles, the weapons, the enemies, it was all amazing to play and I can see why this game is so highly spoken of. Countless times the audio would just stop altogether, the game would bug out and I would be stuck to an item, or crate would kill me, but the bugs were a small problem to a fantastic experience. Going into this, I thought I would just wish for it to end so I could move onto 2, but it was worth sticking to it till the end.

Get ready to fight government death squads and aliens from other dimmentions as you traverse the Black-Massa science facility, in this iconic FPS.

The first of the amazing Half-Life series, as well as the inspiration for the popular Counter-Strike Source, and CS GO. I strongly recommend it! Very cool, and loads of fun!

Half-Life revolutionized the FPS genre. Has it aged well? Yes.

The game is a bit longer than I expected, and is paced a bit slowly, but the story is good otherwise. The combat is fast paced, and there are many ways to approach a situation, which is good. The game has little to no bugs. (except a bug that can glitch a mini boss into not fighting you, which happened to me.) I had no problem of finding how to progress, which 90's games always have that stigma for. Is the game still worth playing today? Yes. It's fun, and shows how much FPS games have evolved.

7/10

I feel this game would be a recommend if you really want to know the start of Half Life and experience it for your self. As far as the story goes, I would recommend this game. Much of the level design is interesting, and the situations you often find yourself in in this game are amusing. However, what makes me on the fence and into the realm of not recommending this game is what splits me from the many people who would recommend this game. 

I still play and enjoy older style and older made games in the early 2000's, but this game is hard to play at moments. Obscure sections of difficult platforming with a character who slides across surfaces as if they were lightly covered in a sheet of ice, hidden caves to continue on the story that blend in completely with the environments, enemies that come at such strength that often you almost feel like it is necessary to "cheese" them in order to progress. I love challenging games, I often play on the hardest difficulty in games, but with this one I went on normal difficulty, and still was often frustrated by the enemies, platforming, and generally not knowing where to go. You see, I could look past the hard enemies, and strange hidden platforming, but these hidden spots and platforming are often so un-obvious that I often found myself watching a guide in order to progress. Which is not how I would usually enjoy playing a game. 

Maybe I just don't know what's going on, maybe I am not meant for this game, but I just wanted to toss my 2 cents in for a game that is sitting with overwhelmingly positive reviews.

Did I enjoy the game? Yes. Did I enjoy the game as a video game (actually playing it)? At times, but not so much. This game is by no means bad, but not one I would recommend to others unless they already wanted to play it.

Прошёл оригинальный [b]Half-Life снова,[/b] спустя больше чем 20 лет. Он очень устарел. Не только по графике - это очевидно. По UX. Слишком быстрый бег. Слишком мусорный прыжковый геймплей. Слишком рвущие flow “головоломки”. Слишком тугие враги по параметру “выстрелы на убийство”. И всё же он хорош. Своим нарративом и интерактивом. Своим настроением и атмосферой. Даже своей, теперь кажущейся неуклюжей, динамикой. Игры плохо проходят проверку временем, и эта не исключение. Но лучшие примеры, постарев, всё равно сохраняют то, за что их любили “тогда”. То, почему они стали большими и значимыми для индустрии и миллионов её потребителей. Снова прошёл HL, и он - хорошая игра.
this game is very fun and some hard challenges, i recomend it for first person shooters.

22 yıllık bir oyun olmasına rağmen kaliteli hikayesi ile hala oynanabilirliğini sunuyor. Sonradan güncelleme almasına rağmen hala kanser noktaları var. Oyuna başlarken ki tren yolculuğunuz bunlardan bir tanesi. Bazı yerlerde buglar var. Örnek verecek olursak tüneller içerisinde sıkışıp kalabiliyorusunuz , noclip açarak geçmeniz gerekiyor. Bazı yerlerde kapılar açılmıyor. Son saveden yeniden oynamanız gerekmekte. Oyunun şöyle bir özelliği var : İndirimlerde 1.8 tl. Bu fiyata oyunu alıp oynamanız bence kesinlikle gerekiyor. Gordon Freeman'ın piksellerle boğuşması ile karşı karşıyasınız.
Anlatmama gerek var mı?
